events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred on the morning of June 1st, requesting to file an insurance claim.
The claim was categorised under 'Auto Accident' based on the customer's description involving a vehicle collision.
An insurance agent was assigned promptly to handle the claim and provide support for the customer throughout the process.
Acknowledgement of receipt of the claim was sent to the customer along with an overview of the next steps and necessary documents.
Requested accident report, driver's license copy, and photographs of the damaged vehicle to proceed with the claim investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including police report and vehicle images, enabling the investigation to begin.
The investigation team commenced the review of all evidence related to the auto accident claim for assessment.
Investigation concluded with confirmation of fault and extent of damages on the customer's vehicle after thorough analysis.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering repair costs and rental car reimbursement for the duration.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the quick handling of their auto claim.
Approval for the settlement was issued, ensuring funds will be disbursed to cover repair expenses as agreed.
Payment was transferred to the customer's preferred account to settle the approved amount for the vehicle repairs.
The auto accident claim was formally closed after confirmation from the customer that all issues were fully resolved.
The claim documentation was archived securely for future reference and audit purposes in the insurance system.
